Race.SpecificTitle: Justice of the Peace -- Justice of the Peace District 3
Constable -- Justice of the Peace District 2
Constable -- Justice of the Peace District 4
PW School District No.1-A -- 21 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(School District No. 1-A Millage Renewal) 

Summary:  10 year, 21 mills tax renewal for School District No. 1-A (Parishwide) of the Parish of LaSalle for the purpose of paying the costs of operation and maintenance of, and improvements to, public schools.
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 1-A (Parishwide) of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a twenty-one (21) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in said District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018 (an estimated $875,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of paying the costs of operation and maintenance of, and improvements to, public schools in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 4 -- 10 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 4 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year 10 mills property tax renewal for constructing, improving and maintaining public roads and bridges within Road District No. 4.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 4 of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019 (an estimated $32,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of constructing, improving and maintaining public roads and bridges within the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 7 -- 10 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 7 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year 10 mills property tax renewal for constructing, improving and maintaining public roads and bridges within Road District No. 7.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 7 of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019 (an estimated $46,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of constructing, improving and maintaining public roads and bridges within the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 9 -- 10 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 9 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year 10 mills property tax renewal for constructing, improving and maintaining public roads and bridges within Road District No. 9.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 9 of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019 (an estimated $27,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of constructing, improving and maintaining public roads and bridges within the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 10 -- 7.02 Mills - PJ - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 10 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  5 years, 7.02 mills property tax continuation for road and bridge construction and maintenance for Road District No. 10.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 10, LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a seven and two hundredths (7.02) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2013 (an estimated $22,700 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of road and bridge construction and maintenance for the District, title to which shall be in the public?

Race.SummaryText:
Little Creek-Searcy Volunteer Fire District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 20 mills property tax renewal for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment for Little Creek-Searcy Volunteer Fire District and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes.
Race.FullText: Shall Little Creek-Searcy Volunteer Fire District, LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of twenty (20) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019 (an estimated $55,800 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment for the District and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?

Race.SummaryText:
Summerville-Rosefield Volunteer Fire District Proposition
(Millage Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 20.05 mills property tax continuation for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment for Summerville-Rosefield Volunteer Fire District and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes.
Race.FullText: Shall Summerville-Rosefield Volunteer Fire District, LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of twenty and five hundredths (20.05) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019 (an estimated $86,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment for the District and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?

Race.SummaryText:
Recreation District #10 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  20.63 mill, 10 year tax renewal for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating recreational facilities of the District.
Race.FullText: Shall the LaSalle Recreation District #10 of LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a twenty and sixty-three hundredths (20.63) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019 (an estimated $66,325 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating recreational facilities of the District?
